product.title: AIKO PRO 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold
product.title_excluding_brand: 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold
product.description: AIKO PRO 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold
product.description_html: AIKO PRO 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold
product.description_full:
AIKO PRO 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold * 4 INTERCHANGEABLE HAIR STYLING TOOLS: The AIKO Pro hot air brush kit comes with 4 interchangeable brush head that make straightening, curling, volumizing, and scalp massaging a breeze. It is easy to change brush heads just by pressing the button.
 * NEGATIVE ION BLOW DRYER: AIKO Pro hot comb hair straightener uses advanced negative ion technology and ceramic coating to prevent frizz and static. Thanks to the combination of nylon pin and tufted bristles, our hair dryer brush minimizes tangling and breakage along with helping provide comfortable scalp massages
 * CARING FOR YOUR HAIR: Less Damage & Frizzy, More Care & Smooth. With negative ions air heat vents and 3D stereo comb, providing additional shine and reducing frizz. Ceramic coating protects your hair through even heat distribution.
 * ADJUSTABLE TEMP SETTINGS: The AIKO PRO hair dryer volumizer takes up 1000W/110V and offers 2 temperature controls and 3-speed settings to give you more control when styling hair. It’s also perfect for use in different seasons for all hair types to help you easily get the hairstyle you’ve always wanted
 * TRAVEL-FRIENDLY & SAFE: The blowout brush meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal.The ALCI safety plug will automatically power off to definitely ensure your safe. It has a unique oval design that helps smooth hair and prevent tangles. The AIKO hot air brush it is lightweight and ergonomic and easy to grip with a 360° rotatable power cord, allowing you to make it easy and comfortable to use.
product.description_full_html:
AIKO PRO 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush, Negative Ion Detachable Hair Dryer Styler Hot Air Hair Dryer for Straightening Curling Drying Multifunctional Styling, 1000W, Gray, Rose Gold
  • 4 INTERCHANGEABLE HAIR STYLING TOOLS: The AIKO Pro hot air brush kit comes with 4 interchangeable brush head that make straightening, curling, volumizing, and scalp massaging a breeze. It is easy to change brush heads just by pressing the button.
  • NEGATIVE ION BLOW DRYER: AIKO Pro hot comb hair straightener uses advanced negative ion technology and ceramic coating to prevent frizz and static. Thanks to the combination of nylon pin and tufted bristles, our hair dryer brush minimizes tangling and breakage along with helping provide comfortable scalp massages
  • CARING FOR YOUR HAIR: Less Damage & Frizzy, More Care & Smooth. With negative ions air heat vents and 3D stereo comb, providing additional shine and reducing frizz. Ceramic coating protects your hair through even heat distribution.
  • ADJUSTABLE TEMP SETTINGS: The AIKO PRO hair dryer volumizer takes up 1000W/110V and offers 2 temperature controls and 3-speed settings to give you more control when styling hair. It’s also perfect for use in different seasons for all hair types to help you easily get the hairstyle you’ve always wanted
  • TRAVEL-FRIENDLY & SAFE: The blowout brush meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal.The ALCI safety plug will automatically power off to definitely ensure your safe. It has a unique oval design that helps smooth hair and prevent tangles. The AIKO hot air brush it is lightweight and ergonomic and easy to grip with a 360° rotatable power cord, allowing you to make it easy and comfortable to use.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
